description:
Dark Bone summons a Majin once again, but Dragon summons a Majin to oppose it. The Majin`s power fills Dragon, who gets a Bone Crush on one of the Dark Bones. The Dark Bone`s true face is revealed... and it looks almost human! The Dark Bones retreat, and the fist Dragon used to land the blow fossilizes. After unequipping, Shougo realizes that the change extends to the Dragon Card, too: Dragon Bone has fossilized.
Source: crunchyroll
